dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, in December 2023, the Eurasian Economic Union just signed a major protocol amending their Customs Code Treaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, in December twenty twenty three, the Eurasian Economic Union just signed a major protocol amending their Customs Code Treaty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In December 2023, the heads of state of the Eurasian Economic Union (EAEU) member countries signed a protocol amending the EAEU Customs Code Treaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right—this is all about cross-border e-commerce regulation, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right-this is all about cross-border e-commerce regulation, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These changes are aimed at comprehensive regulation of cross-border e-commerce and will come into effect after the ratification procedures are completed in all member states, according to "Ak Zhaik".

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they're introducing this new category called "e-commerce goods" for stuff people buy on foreign online platforms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they're introducing this new category called e-commerce goods for stuff people buy on foreign online platforms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, goods purchased by individuals on foreign online platforms will be classified into a separate category " "e-commerce goods".

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a pretty big shift. I mean, they're also creating a whole new role—the e-commerce operator.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a pretty big shift. I mean, they're also creating a whole new role-the e-commerce operator.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new institution will be introduced " the e-commerce operator, a legal entity registered in a special registry, which will handle the declaration of such goods on behalf of individuals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, these operators have to be registered in a special registry and they'll handle customs declarations on behalf of individuals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, these operators have to be registered in a special registry and they'll handle customs declarations on behalf of individuals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new institution will be introduced " the e-commerce operator, a legal entity registered in a special registry, which will handle the declaration of such goods on behalf of individuals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which honestly sounds like it could simplify things for buyers, but also adds a layer of bureaucracy, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which honestly sounds like it could simplify things for buyers, but also adds a layer of bureaucracy, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And there's a new type of customs declaration just for these e-commerce goods.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And there's a new type of customs declaration just for these e-commerce goods.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A new type of customs declaration will be introduced specifically for e-commerce goods.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus a flat 5% duty rate on the value, unless the item's under €200—then it stays duty-free.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus a flat five percent duty rate on the value, unless the item's under two hundred euros-then it stays duty-free.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A unified customs duty rate of 5% of the value of the goods will be applied to e-commerce products. However, items whose value does not exceed the ‚¬200 duty-free import limit will remain exempt from this duty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is interesting 'cause that €200 threshold is actually pretty generous compared to some regions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is interesting 'cause that two hundred euros threshold is actually pretty generous compared to some regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. And delivery can happen either straight from the seller or through the operator's warehouse in the buyer's country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. And delivery can happen either straight from the seller or through the operator's warehouse in the buyer's country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Delivery to the customer will be carried out in two ways " directly from the foreign seller or through the e-commerce operator's warehouse in the buyer's country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So more options, but also more complexity in logistics, I'd imagine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So more options, but also more complexity in logistics, I'd imagine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And the Eurasian Economic Commission is gonna adopt acts to put all this into practice once it's ratified.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And the Eurasian Economic Commission is gonna adopt acts to put all this into practice once it's ratified.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To implement its powers, the Eurasian Economic Commission will adopt relevant acts that will come into force simultaneously with the amendments to the EAEU Customs Code Treaty, the publication states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like they're really trying to catch up with how much online shopping has exploded.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like they're really trying to catch up with how much online shopping has exploded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and standardizing this across member states could reduce a lot of confusion at borders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and standardizing this across member states could reduce a lot of confusion at borders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Assuming everyone implements it smoothly, which… you know, customs changes are always tricky.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Assuming everyone implements it smoothly, which... you know, customs changes are always tricky.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh for sure. But a unified 5% rate? That's at least straightforward for businesses to plan around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh for sure. But a unified five percent rate? That's at least straightforward for businesses to plan around.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A unified customs duty rate of 5% of the value of the goods will be applied to e-commerce products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Let's see how this plays out once it goes into effect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Let's see how this plays out once it goes into effect.
